"I don't know just sad I guess." said Timmy

"Well, kind of." said Timmy
"I just sometimes wish I was a baby again and someone would actually take care of me." said Timmy.

Timmy sat on the floor of his room in nothing but a diaper and a pink bonnet.
Who will take care of him?
1111.title: I don't know just said I guess

choices: Back over to Cosmo and Wanda
11111.content:
Cosmo floated down to the floor and picked up Timmy, holding his baby godson close to his chest. "I'm sure we can take care of you, sport." Cosmo poofed a blanket into existence as he wrapped Timmy up in the soft material. Looking around his bedroom one last time, Timmy smiled as Cosmo poofed both of them back into the fishbowl castle.

Poof was busy with animate spells in his playroom, bringing his toys and stuffed animals to life and making them do things. Currently, one of these spells decided to up and run wild on him as a gigantic Kangaroo Plushy easily three times his size was busy holding Wanda down onto a changing table and applying what had to be a third diaper around her waist, spreading her legs far apart to keep her from even walking if she wanted to. Poof himself was wrapped up in about five diapers and was inside of the Kangaroos' pouch, trying his darndest to undo the massive zipper keeping him trapped inside, but it was hard since the kangaroo decided to put mittens on them both. "Aww, little Wanda you look so, so cute!" Cooed the Kangaroo plushy as she nuzzled and kissed Wanda, "I am going to get your dindin ready soon, just go inside with your baby brother while I get your baby bottles ready. and then we can go out and get Cosmo too." Wanda in a flurry was lifted into the air as she saw hers and Poofs' wands stuck behind the Kangaroo plushies ears, out of her reach as the kangaroo unzipped her pouch and dropped her inside next to her son, "You will all be my little dollies forever and ever, I will always change your diapers!" as the Kangaroo began to zip her pouch shut again, a green beam of magic zapped out and hit the plushie, causing it to go lifeless once again.

Cosmo flew over and unzipped the kangaroos pouch as he lifted Poof out and held onto him before reaching inside and pulling out Wanda before narrowing the gap and pulling his wife into a hug and kiss. "I would make a knight in shining armor joke, but it looks like I am the only one without a ton of protection." Giggled Cosmo as he patted his hand on the thick bulk of Wandas' many diapers around her, causing his wife to blush heavily until Cosmo stole another kiss from her while she was distracted, "Not to worry, I'll get your wands. Hold Timmy for me will you." Cosmo pushed Timmy into Wandas' arms as he flew to get the wands of his family from the Kangaroo Plushies ears. Wandas' brain finally caught up with her ears as she soon looked down at Timmy Turner, her godson, now as small and padded like Poof was. "Cosmo, what happened to Timmy?" "Timmy wished to be a baby again and have somebody take care of him, so I agreed us to take care of him." Said Cosmo as he retrieved the wands and gave them back to Wanda and Poof, "Besides, we all know how Timmy's parents act: he's miserable in his house, it's why we were assigned to be his Fairy Godparents." Wanda set Timmy down on the floor as she floated off to talk with Cosmo some more.

Timmy had been in Poofs' playroom many times before, but never truly did he play in here. Crawling over to Poof, Timmy noticed that Poof seemed rounder than he remembered him before. Poof on the other hand was struggling to fly again, but with three more diapers than he cared to have was holding him down. Out of the corner of his eye, Poof saw a small buck-toothed baby crawling in his direction as it sat and looked up at him. Poof soon saw as the baby raised his hand to pat it on the poofy diapers wrapped around the fairy only to frown as he began to pat his own diaper which seemed flat and boring by comparison. It was no secret that babies everywhere preferred to wear diapers which were both very soft and very thick. Poof shook his wand as Timmy felt his diaper swell in size and softness, making him giggle happily to himself as Poof removed the extra layers around his waistline and drop them to the floor, allowing Poof to be airborne once again.

Timmy looked around the playroom as he saw Cosmo and Wanda talking quietly to one-another before looking back to Poof as he began flying around more of the enchanted toys (not as intense as the Kangaroo Plushie from before). Without a second thought, Timmy decides to crawl...
11111.title: Cosmo and Wanda

111111.content:
Timmy decides to crawl over to Cosmo and Wanda, who were discussing what to do with Timmy, now that he's a baby again.
After both of them nodded, whereas Wanda picked up Timmy, holding him towards her, kissing him on the forehead.
"Sport," said Wanda, "Cosmo and I have been talking about your wish of being a baby again, and it got us thinking... would you like to be part of our family?"
Timmy could not believe his ears. Cosmo and Wanda, his fairy godparents, wanted to adopt him.
Timmy stretched out to Wanda, wanting a hug.
Wanda hugged Timmy, only then to hear...
111111.title: Back over to Cosmo and Wanda

111112.content:
Timmy crawled over to Poof, interested in what he's up to.

Poof then saw Timmy's hat under his bonnet and asked with a babyish voice, "Timmy?"
Timmy gave Poof a hug, happy that he recognized him, Poof returning the hug.
Just then, Poof had an idea. He shook his rattle, and POOF... a pacifier appeared in his hand.
Poof held the pacifier towards Timmy, wanting him to have it.

choices: Chuck the infant over the wall! -Instant Game over-
11223122.content:
Timmy turns his head in disgust. "Fwa-ee's? 'ha 'ace fo 'abbies!"
Wanda just smiled at his babbled statement. "Of course! And you sweetie, are a very cute baby, so it's perfect for you!"
Timmy open his mouth to babble some more, only to be cut off by a pink pacifier that was poofed into his mouth. He suckled on it frustrated, his chubby cheeks a pouty cherry red.
"And while you're there, your parents will be on an extended cruise, we, as in me and Cosmo, will be on vacation, traveling around the world!" She said happily.
Cosmo poofed beside her, in a poncho and sombrero, shaking two maracas humorously. "First stop is mexico! Tacos, Mariachi's, tacos, bull running, tacos, Aztec ruins, and TACOS!" He said excitedly. "All while you stay in daycare in your poopy diapers, HOORAY!" He tossed his hands up in the air happily, much to Timmy's misery and grumpiness.
Wanda smiled, kissing Timmy on the cheek, leaving a red lipstick mark. "We'll be sure to check on you every once in a while, and we'll be picking you up just before Summer vacation ends." That last part caused Timmy to tear up, no summer vacation? That was without a doubt, the worst possible thing ever.
"Well sport, no point in delaying it any longer!" Wanda raised her wand, and in an instant, they we're poofed outside the Learnatorium, by the entrance, the pencils, overly large books that decorated the building felt oppressive, even more so was the cinderblock wall for the big kids yard, it made it feel more like a prison then a daycare.
Timmy Squirmed in Wanda's arms, Wanda was in full adult form, looking around, wondering how to drop Timmy off. They could just walk in, but on the side of the building was a chute that was labeled 'Happy Bob's Fun Time Auto Drop Off Fun System! tm'. It had a slide they could put Timmy down and everything!
Wanda Ponders for a moment on what to do...
11223122.title: "Flappy Bob’s Learnatorium!"

112231222.content:
Wanda walks over to the chute with a warm smile, she opens the hatch to it, and holds Timmy over it. Timmy was currently distraught, struggling and wiggling in Wanda's hands, wanting oh so desperately to get out of this situation without his summer wasted and his dignity intact. Wanda had just smirked slightly at this. "See you, sweetie." She said, bidding fairwell with a kiss on the forehead, dropping Timmy into the Chute diaper first.Timmy cried out as she did, a bit frightened by the dark chute, a bit frightened at the sudden drop that Wanda had did, dropping him in. If he was still a boy, it would be a simple frightened yell, as baby, it came out as a frightened cry. Wanda had a slight look of concern as Timmy's cry faded out of distance, but she quickly shook it off. She smiled at her husband. "Let's go on that cruise!" She said, raising her wand, and just like that, with a 'poof', they we're gone.
Timmy Turner was sliding down a very steep slope, which admittedly, was getting slowly and slowly more perpendicular to the ground, didn't change the fact that Timmy was scared and crying out for help. Soon, the slope had reached the point that it became a slide, and was making a few turns in the walls, still, it was too dark to see anything. After what seemed like a few minutes, Timmy was suddenly greeted by a bright light and a cushy surface, he was ontop of a raised platform, a conveyor belt, ontop of a pink pillow. Timmy hadn't managed to stop crying, really, he was bawling his eyes out.
112231222.title: Use the Fun Time Chute!

1122312221.content:
Timmy continued to cry, and cry loudly, making a high pitched squeaky cry like babies do, until he was cut off by a pacifier being shoved into his mouth. Timmy suckled instinctively, still upset and blurry eyed, but he was able to get a look at his surroundings. He was on a conveyor belt, with a glass fence on the sides to keep him from falling off, beyond the glass fence we're painted walls, and decorations supposed to be calming, along with an animatronic duck in the corner, 'playing' a light tune on a fake guitar, kinda... creepy. There we're machines with robot arms attached to the ceiling, lined up along the conveyor belt, one of them had reached down and shoved the pacifier into his mouth.
The conveyor started moving, two hands moved down, grabbing Timmy's legs, and pulling them into the air, spread apart, forcing Timmy onto his back, he can't help but suckle on his pacifier nervously. More arms extend into the conveyor, proceeding to rip Timmy's clothes off, diaper and all. Timmy layed there naked, scared and cold as a camera and monitor extended out. The camera scanned him, and the results showed up on the monitor.
Age: 1
Hair: brown
Weight: 18 Lb
Sex:...
1122312221.title: Continue

He tried to make sense of it, but the conveyor started moving again, a tube sprayed baby powder on his rear, and he was slid under a pink, baby block unicorn diaper with rainbow tape, embarrassing...
The diaper was taped on, then a pink onesie, booties, mittens, and bonnet we're put on Timmy by the conveyor's oddly versatile hands.
Two claws lower, grabbing Timmy under the arms and pulling him off the conveyor, and into a Highchair seat, which he began to struggle in, there was a tv in front of him, which flicked on by itself, he was greated by two familiar but not exactly pleasant figures.

15112.content:
It was an average day in the Turner household, as the thirteen-year old Timmy sat on his bed reading a manga book. His dog Sparky was on his lap, as the silence was shattered by Vicky banging on his bedroom door. A week, he had to deal with Vicky for a week because of his parents going on a first Honeymoon, despite the fact they had already done it 16 times. "You're dead twerp! You didn't do my laundry!" Vicky screamed from the door.

"Yeah, its not like I wish some random sports object would fly through the hallway window and hit you on the head." Timmy stated, as his fairies who were in the fish bowl waved their wands, causing the sound of a breaking wood and the sound of a skull crack was heard. "Uh, Vicky?" Timmy got up along with his dog, as they both walked over to the door. Timmy opened it slowly to see an unconscious Vicky along with a bowling ball. "Ah crap. I'm dead. I'm dead. Sparky wish up some passports and-" He was cut off by Vicky rising up, causing him to fall to his back. "Heheh' Hey Vicky, uh-" He was cut off by her saying something.

"Daada." Vicky smiled at Timmy who looked confused.

"Uh, Vicky?" Timmy got up and looked at her.

"I think she got a concussion and now she thinks she's a baby." Sparky summarized. "Like that TV Show I saw."

"There's no way she could think she's a bab-" Timmy was cut off by the sound of trickling as he looks over to see Vicky was peeing herself. He couldn't help but grin. "Cosmo, Wanda, Poof, I wish.."

1533.content: Let's get a bit more interesting
1533.title: Other choices

15331.content:
Tootie ran around her backyard, going through another one of her elaborate fantasies about Timmy, of course. Finally she jumped and landed on the ground, holding a Timmy doll.

"Oh Timmy, one day sweetie, one day you will be mine." She said. Meanwhile, a tiny spaceship hovered above her up in the clouds.

"Well well well, looks like I've got a link to warrior Turner. At last I shall take the revenge for my people against him, and now I have a lead right too him!" A familiar bunny-shaped figure said looking at Tootie through a screen. The Gigglepie pressed a button on it's ship and beamed Tootie up in seconds, eager to interrogate her.

"Hm? Where am I?" She asked. Metal arms appeared from the floor and restrained Tootie as the Gigglepie walked up.

"So sorry my dear for I am quite harmless as you see. I am what is called a Gigglepie, my name is Mufi." Mufi tried introducing, Tootie was instantly smitten.

"Awwww, you're sooo cute! What're you doing little guy?" Tootie asks.

"I am looking for Timmy Turner, tell me and you'll be on your way. Don't worry about him, all I want is to make him pay." Mufi said. Tootie snapped out of her daze.

"What! There's no way I'm going to betray my darling Timmy! I won't tell you anything!" Tootie remarked.

"Oh it's a shame that my news has made you quite hyper. So until you tell me his location, you can wait in a diaper!" Mufi responded walking away.

"Um what?" Tootie asked confused.
15331.title: Taken by Gigglepies

153311.content:
Tootie is lightly pricked in the back, and she suddenly passes out. Mufi stands back and watches while the ships robot arms undress Tootie and slips her into a black T-shirt and a purple diaper. Mufi smiles and walks to the other side of the room and opens a small glass container.

"It's a shame you had to be so fickle, for this little toy will make you feel tickled. If you don't want to tell me to my face, then I shall just take you to my home in outer space. I shall....(sigh).....I need to calm down on the rhymes when they can't hear me." Mufi said to himself. He lifts his "toy" from the glass case, a tiny metal bug, about the size of a quarter. Mufi set the bug on Tooties belly and flipped it on. It got up and immediately crawled towards her diaper and went inside, Mufi watched as it crawled further and further down, eventually disapppearing. Mufi smiled and walked back to the front of his ship, and took off. After a few minutes, he was already light-years from Earth, and settling his ship into a large space station.

"At last, I shall at least have someone else to occupy these empty halls with me for a little while." Mufi said unlocking Tootie and setting her in the cargo hold. "Now to go prep the interrogation chamber* Mufi said to himself. Meanwhile, while he was gone, Tootie slowly started to come to.

"Woah, wha-what happened?" Tootie said. She woke up immediately when she felt her diaper. Tootie smiled sheepishly. "This isn't too bad actually, if only I could get Timmy to join me in this. (slaps herself) No! I need to get out of here first." Tootie told herself. She stood up and walked over to a vent and pried it off, she'd have to be quiet to escape this. Only minutes after she left though, Mufi returned.

"Oh well, that's not a problem at all." Mufi said to himself pulling out a remote and pressing one of the buttons.
